nodes.text: Howler was the name of a jurgoran residing on the reconstituted Sith Empire's capital Dromund Kaas around 3643 BBY, when it was killed by an Imperial-affiliated individual.

Howler appears in the 2011 video game Star Wars: The Old Republic as a Champion boss on the planet Dromund Kaas. He is not directly involved in any quests, but can be killed by any Imperial character for loot and as part of the achievement. This article assumes 100% game completion, which means he was killed. Star Wars: The Old Republic Explorer's Guide labels the jurgoran's location on Dromund Kaas, but uses the name "Burlyhoof the Howler."
